page.title: 07LLANGURIG, EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There is{little unemployment}in Llangurig. Some women work in{Laura {Ashley's}factory in Carno. Some men work for{B.S.K.}in Llanidloes. Only three men are directly employed by farmers. Several work as{self-employed agricultural contractors. A local crew work for the{Forestry {Commission.}A few work for the {Economic Forestry.} There are{4 {mechanics}in the village but they travel away to work. Four men work in the{building trade in Llanidloes. There are two {electricians, one electronics {engineer, and one heating engineer. There are six married{women teachers who are{not employed}in education. One man is a{hydrologist}employed by the Department of the Environment. One works for the{County Council.}Several women do casual work in{local hotels.
